llm_command:
kubectl apply -n checkoutservice -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-checkout-communication
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  ingress:
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: cartservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7070
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: currencyservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: productcatalogservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 3550
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: shippingservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: emailservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 5000
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: paymentservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 50051
EOF
